item.title: My First Post Using Hugo and Github Pages
item.description: Hello world! Welcome to my new GitHub Pages blog This site was generated using Hugo, a fast and simple framework for building static webpages. Hugo works nicely with GitHub pages for hosting simple web content. I hope to post personal projects and guides related to information security, programming, game development, data science, and more!
item.content:
Hello world!

Welcome to my new GitHub Pages blog

This site was generated using Hugo, a fast and simple framework for building static webpages. Hugo works nicely with GitHub pages for hosting simple web content. I hope to post personal projects and guides related to information security, programming, game development, data science, and more!
